title: How to Win a Lightsaber Duel on Jedi Academy

steps.headline: Sidestep a lot and around the cultist and slash when the cultist isn't.
Keep your line of vision (cross hair) on the cultist at all times.
Block as many of his attacks as you can.
Make good use of any force powers you have(light saber throw, grip, lightning, drain).
If you don't have force absorb, get it!!!
steps.description: (It will protect you from any dark side powers doing damage to you.

steps.headline: When the cultist is in close range, try using an attack Kata.

text: Sidestep a lot and around the cultist and slash when the cultist isn't.  Keep your line of vision (cross hair) on the cultist at all times.  Block as many of his attacks as you can.  Make good use of any force powers you have(light saber throw, grip, lightning, drain).  If you don't have force absorb, get it!!! (It will protect you from any dark side powers doing damage to you. Keep moving, never remain stationary.  When the cultist is in close range, try using an attack Kata.
